projects.title: RTArchive
projects.description: Frontend to explore Archived roosterteeth.com data, youtube-like player. Also supports bulk downloading and browsing in a Netflix-like UI with Search. Backend using Express, PostgresSQL.

projects.title: Rooster
projects.description: Custom archiver that downloaded and uploaded ~42K roosterteeth.com video content to Internet Archive running concurrently on VMs. Handles all media type and metadata extraction, as well as custom API support for fallback metadata.

projects.title: Spotify Stats
projects.description: Webapp to explore your Spotify History, nowplaying UI, and a Playlist maker / Recommendation Engine using individuals spotify history and openAI model to suggest music based on scenario, mood and time/day.

projects.title: Moment Seeker - Transcript Search
projects.description: Fullstack webapp to search your favorite moments / lines in various TV shows. Data sanitize and migration using Python, backend, search and front-end is built using Express/React. TVDB/Subscene API for Transcript and Episode tagging.

projects.title: talk2human
projects.description: Very simple app to find and talk to human customer care agents as fast as possible on various customer care call centers. (eg. Banks/E-Commerce Websites)

projects.title: mac-setup
projects.description: Guide to setup a fresh macOS installation automatically, saving time and effort. Includes 3rd-party apps, ssh and gpg setups

projects.title: LyriCatch
projects.description: Cross platform Python app to fetch, show and download lyrics from currently playing song. Supports Spotify and last.fm

projects.title: Text in a Bottle
projects.description: Simple and fast webapp made in Python to create and share text or code snippets. Has live Markdown editing and publishing, supports creating super fast and light web page to share via Markdown. Made using Flask and MongoDB. Click demo to use the site.

projects.title: Deepfake Detection using Xception
projects.description: Detecting deepfakes specially found in Social Media and usually low-res using custom Xception Deep Learning

projects.title: Jumpstart
projects.description: Webapp for installing/updating multiple macOS Applications at once, amazingly faster compared to installing applications one-by-one.

projects.title: Personalwebsite V1
projects.description: V1 of my personal website made using Jekyll, Ruby.

projects.title: Imgbb.sh
projects.description: Command line app to access Imgbb, supports uploading/deleting multiple images from various sources

projects.title: python-scripts
projects.description: Collection of smaller python projects including Covid Data Tracker, OCR to Google, Tesla Charge Reminder etc.

projects.title: Reach: WiFi Analyzer
projects.description: Reach automagically searches and figures out the best wifi channel for your network avoiding populated channels.

projects.title: shell-scripts
projects.description: Big collection of shell scripts including automating complete computer setup, system services and apps. Also includes a number of script to automate uploading, downloading and backing up computer.
